綁.definition: to tie; bind or fasten together; to kidnap

綁定.definition: (loanword) binding; to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)

綁架.definition: to kidnap; to abduct; to hijack; a kidnapping; abduction; staking

綁樁.definition: (Tw) to buy off influential people (in an election, a call for tenders etc)

綁紮.definition: to bind; to wrap up; (computing) binding

綁縛.definition: to tie up; to bind; to tether; bondage (BDSM)

綁赴市曹.definition: to bind up and take to the market (idiom); to take a prisoner to the town center for execution
